PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Gear breakdown and budget
Gems : 300c Fractal thoughts : 1c / LA Enchant (20ex, wtf I bought mine for 6) / Ice shot 5ex (angle) Hyrri's 6L : 2ex Tamings : For two 120c // Ventor's (10 quant / positive rarity / positive res : 4ex for 2 Boots : Elusive/MS/Res boots 3ex (MAX) / Goldwyrms 20 quant 30c Amulet : 2ex / or craft with Dexterity essence on a lvl 85 Shaper AGATE amulet until you can harvest craft it (or bisco if you're good with attributes) Voidfletcher (corrupted cold dam) 1ex https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Harvest/XRgP6JcP Bow : 10ex max https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Harvest/GlVvzLOsb Watchers : Hatred crit (5ex https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Harvest/k4YE6I5 ) OR Hatred penetration ( 3ex https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Harvest/2Xem5hk) OR Hatred flat (1ex https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Harvest/2Xem5hk ) Lioneye's fall : 15c Corrupted blood jewel : 1ex https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Harvest/Xm7QLbuP Brutal restraint : 15c (Divine it until you get AT LEAST + 250 dex from it) Dying Sun : 10c Cinderswallow my dick : 1.5ex https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Harvest/L2gqDGun Stygian vise : 1ex https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Harvest/2nl4bPYFk OR Headhunter OR Bisco's Leash Gloves : https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Harvest/z9Q8j8gf4 / 30C, open prefix for attack speed benchcraft, OR Elemental weakness Sadimas OR Attack crit Sadima's for MF https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Harvest/KY4yW0DC5 (30c)
TOTAL MINIMUM FOR T16 SHREDDING
20ex / Optimal 30ex (Awakened Gems (WED, Added cold, Cold pen, Chain) / POWERBLASTING 50ex (Good bow, enchanted helm, good watchers, chain/proj quiver)
